skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Smashes the enemy and decreases the target's Defense for 1 turn. The damage of this skill is proportionate to your MAX HP and this attack will increase your Attack Speed for 2 turns if it lands as a Critical Hit.
skills.multiplier_formula: 1.1*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Meditate
skills.description: Recovers 40% of the MAX HP through meditation. This skill will heal the ally with the lowest HP ratio instead, if your HP is more than 50%.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.4*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark> (Fixed)

skills.name: Trick of Light
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a spell that summons the power of light. This attack has a 50% chance to increase the target's chances of landing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns. The damage of this skill is proportionate to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.3*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
